about_the_game:
Are you the next big truck tycoon?

Prove yourself in one of the best free truck manager sim games in the world, and beat your friends and other real life truckers to top the leaderboards by controlling highway routes. Build your manager empire today!

  • Real truck models to use

  • Real cities and roads all over the world

Create and manage your own logistics strategy

In this multiplayer real trucker simulator game you have the possibility to create a bigger empire than real businesses such as FedEx, Amazon, DHL and DSV.

You can even drive while being idle on your couch to the world’s most amazing cities such as New York, Tokyo, London, Los Angeles, Shanghai, Paris and Seoul. Travel from America to Europe to Asia with the press of a button.

Scaling difficulty

Choose the easy way or the more realistic way. You can start off your journey in a tycoon fashion and focus on a great and casual gameplay or you can maximise your performance to test your own limits.

Indulge yourself in realistic trailer and vehicle models similar to Mercedes, Ford, Volvo, Man, Mitsubishi, Scania and Iveco while you journey the highway from rest area to city. Choose vehicles from nine different types, ranging from Semi-trailer truck to tractor to road train.

Put the game on autopilot or be your own boss in the truck cockpit from departure to arrival no matter if your trucks are on the road or in the garage.

Take the most reliable route possible to transport your cargo. Not by air or sea - but by land. Not by rental car, train, bus, plane or ship - but by truck. Build your fleet of trucks and dominate both the smaller roads and the highways!

Truck Manager features

  • Track your trucks live in the interactive map via satellite GPS

  • Schedule vehicle repairs and maintenance

  • Customize your truck settings and strategy

  • Buy fuel and CO2 quotas at the right time to optimize profits

  • Manage your staff to keep them happy

  • Logistics companies can invest in each other to grow stock values

  • Create marketing campaigns to gain popularity

  • Build or join transport corp manager alliances

  • Top the logistics commander leaderboard

  • Build and expand your tycoon empire

  • Transfer cargo from distribution centers

  • And much more

Take control of your sim strategy and bring your dear cargo safely to its destination. Optimize routes and trucker networks from the live GPS radar and act as traffic control, to become the most dominating road train on trail and street!

You can train and hire great crew and an incredible chauffeur, but only you, the manager, can become the CEO of an empire of cargo and travel routes and utilize your complicated strategy to be the new boss of tycoon delivery.

Note: An online internet-connection is required to play this game.

short_description: Create and manage your own truck company. Create routes and transport cargo all over the world while you expand your fleet of trucks and logistics centers. Truck Manager is among the most realistic of the simulator genre - so prove yourself and beat your friends and other real life managers.
